You can book a scooter by clicking on the location of the skate stand from the map itself.
How can I edit my profile?
From the side menu you can access to your profile and from there you can modify all the fields

In order to go to another city to see the stants you can go from the map itself by navigating and searching for the desired city. In case you want to return to your position there is a button on the top right
¿What is the use of putting the IDN and the Pin?
The PIN and IDN are only used to access the application in a different way. How are they used? at the different stations you will find a screen where you can enter the data

The legal notice and the general conditions of use, or terms and conditions of use, are intended for all those who are going to create a page or website. This document is adapted to the European Regulation of Data Protection (RGPD) and to the recent Organic Law 3/2018, of 5 December, on Personal Data Protection and guarantee of digital rights.

This document contains, in a general way, a set of legal mentions or references that will serve to regulate the conditions in which Internet users access, navigate and use the site or web page. It also includes the rights, obligations and responsibilities to which the parties are mutually subject during access, navigation and use of the website. The inclusion of a legal notice and general conditions of use provides a high level of confidence and legal certainty to each and every website on the Internet.

Activate location to use this functionality

In the Tricoopark mobile application you can reserve lockers so that you can easily, simply and cheaply leave your electric skateboard, so that later you can return for it once the ticket office rental is finished

Select the station closest to you to be able to reserve the locker you want, so that when you arrive, you can store your scooter and thus be able to go where you need to without having to worry about your electric scooter. We will take care of it!
We have our own electric scooters that you can rent for as long as you need to tour the city when you need it.
You can leave the scooter at any of our lockers enabled for it at any of our stations. Do not forget to leave our scooters charging, please!
The application will have your email and phone number. You can also modify your username, ID, telephone number, profile picture and other personal data in the Profile section
In addition, the application will provide you with a randomly generated PIN, this will help you to reserve lockers and scooters in person at any of our stations
To be able to pay easily for renting our lockers or scooters you can enter the credit cards you need with their corresponding card number and thus be able to pay automatically

We will not charge you anything when reserving one of our lockers or skates, but you will have only 15 minutes to get to a station and rent. When you click on "Start!" the rental process will begin at any of our lockers

Finally we want to inform you that you will be charged € 0.05 for each minute you have reserved a skate, as well as an extra for loading your own scooter, an option that you can activate and deactivate from the menu
If you need any kind of extra help, contact our team in the "Assistance" option of the drop-down menu
